landingPage.ourGooddid: We created a new way to produce audio description using AI

help.text: At Beyond Vision, our main goal is to help visually impaired people having more video content adapted for their need.

simplify.text: The process of creating audio description for a movie or a televised show is time consuming and very costly. For independent filmmakers it's almost impossible to make your content available to visually impaired people. Here, at Beyond Vision, we want to give the possibility to everyone to make his content available to ...

propel.subheader: a new way to treat images
propel.text: One of our biggest goal is to create an Artificial Intelligence that it able to extract meaning from short video clips...

may21.label: May 2021
may21.description: Beginning of the development of the software
